tho a slow one , & nothing now
was mending , & in a fair way . Yesterday
expect her within a few weeks
s attendants than for several Years
s Daughter , Lady Anne Fitzroy , now
is said to be a mauvais Sujet . -- The Duke & Duch : of Dorset have been a week
grows monstrously fast , has just now
remain Dear Mrs- Dickinson , Yrs- Sincerely obliged & Affectionately E. Iremonger Midhurst January
